title: Need a quick identification!
content:
Need to get this font ID'd quickly. Seem to find close ones but can't nail it down. Anyone recognize it?

Thanks so much for your time!

Font: 

 Geogrotesque Medium 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160108/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [6thSense.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160108/http:/typophile.com/files/6thSense.jpg) | 95.14 KB |
author: shootzy

comments.content:
Sorry, the apostrophe on Geogrotesque isn't right.

Stratum is also close, but the r is off:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/stratum2/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160108/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/stratum2/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/stratum2/")
That will do the trick. Not exact but will work for what I need. Thanks so much.
